TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClaimsAuthorizationManager extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定義宣告授權管理員的基底實作。

span.span: Defines the base implementation for a claims authorization manager.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別提供基底實作宣告授權管理員。The class provides the base implementation for a claims authorization manager. 宣告授權管理員可以使用下列兩個案例中：A claims authorization manager can be used in the following two scenarios: - 在 web 應用程式和服務，宣告授權管理員可以新增至處理管線，以提供擴充性點，您可以從中授權的應用程式程式碼之前的連入宣告值根據資源的存取權實際實作所要求的資源會呼叫。In web-based applications and services, a claims authorization manager can be added to the processing pipeline to provide an extensibility point from which you can authorize access to a resource according to the value of incoming claims before the application code that actually implements the requested resource is called. - 當您使用類別或執行命令式或宣告式的宣告型存取的類別會在您的程式碼中，檢查已針對您的應用程式的宣告授權管理員由執行系統呼叫核取。When you use the class or the class to perform either imperative or declarative claims-based access checks in your code, the claims authorization manager that is configured for your application is called by the system to perform the check. 在 web 應用程式和桌面應用程式，可以執行宣告型存取檢查。Claims-based access checks can be performed in both web-based applications and desktop applications. 所提供的預設實作類別會顯示每個宣告的存取權授與; 不過，您可以從這個類別衍生並覆寫方法，以提供您自己的授權邏輯。The default implementation provided by the class authorizes access for each claim presented; however, you can derive from this class and override the method to provide your own authorization logic. 宣告授權管理員的使用是選擇性的。The use of a claims authorization manager is optional. 您可以設定您的應用程式使用宣告授權管理員，以程式設計的方式是藉由使用類別，或以宣告方式，藉由指定[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)項目，這是子元素的[ <identityConfiguration> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can configure your application to use a claims authorization manager either programmatically by using the class or declaratively, by specifying the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element, which is a child element of the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element in your application configuration file. 如果您的應用程式是網站或 web 應用程式裝載在網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 中，您也必須新增ASP.NET HTTP 模組集合中。If your application is a web site or a web application hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS), you must also add the in the ASP.NET HTTP Modules collection. > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用類別或類別，用來執行存取檢查的宣告授權管理員是在身分識別組態中所指定的一個屬性。When you use the class or the class, the claims authorization manager that is used to perform the access check is the one that is specified in the identity configuration under the property. 在組態檔中，很``區段，參考從預設``項目。In a configuration file, it is the `` section that is referenced from the default `` element. 這是也適用於 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務與桌面應用程式。This is true even for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) services and desktop applications. 基底類別不接受任何額外的設定; 不過，您可以覆寫衍生類別，以提供從子項目的宣告授權管理員的初始化中``。The base class does not take any additional configuration; however, you can override the in derived classes to provide initialization of your claims authorization manager from child elements of the ``. 典型的案例是使用這些子元素，來指定授權原則會決定哪些宣告類型和值，才能存取哪些資源。The typical scenario is to use these child elements to specify authorization policies which determine which claim types and values are required in order to gain access to which resource. 這不是硬性需求，但您可以自由定義任何使用方式和語法適合您的實作。This is not a hard requirement, though you are free to define whatever usage and syntax make sense for your implementation. ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例取自主題`Claims Based Authorization`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 此範例提供自訂宣告授權管理員可授權主體根據組態中所指定的原則。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 自訂宣告授權管理員是由三個基本元件所組成： 類別衍生自實作管理員，`ResourceAction`類別，其中會有成對資源和動作，以及原則的讀取器讀取並編譯原則指定組態檔中。The custom claims authorization manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 此編譯原則可能則由宣告授權管理員來評估來授與對資源的存取權的主體。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 並非所有的項目會顯示為了保持簡潔。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例的 WIF 以及其下載位置，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼會示範自訂宣告授權管理員的實作。The following code shows the implementation of the custom claims authorization manager. 方法會讀取並編譯組態的原則，藉由使用原則讀取器協助程式類別 （未顯示） 和方法授與或拒絕此原則為基礎的存取。The method reads and compiles the policy from configuration by using the policy reader helper class (not shown) and the method grants or denies access based on this policy. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#2)] 下列程式碼示範`ResourceAction`自訂宣告管理員所使用的類別。The following code shows the `ResourceAction` class used by the custom claims manager. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/resourceaction.cs#1)] 下列 XML 程式碼顯示如何設定宣告授權管理員 web 應用程式裝載在 IIS 7.5 中，如上所示。The following XML shows how to configure the claims authorization manager shown above for a web application hosted in IIS 7.5. 只有當項目特有的宣告授權管理員的組態會顯示。Only the elements specific to the configuration of the claims authorization manager are shown. 請注意，參考類別必須加入至在管線``項目。Note that a reference to the class must be added to the pipeline under the `` element. 站台和應用程式裝載在 IIS 7 之前的 IIS 版本的模組新增至在管線``項目。For sites and applications hosted in versions of IIS prior to IIS 7 the modules can be added to the pipeline under the `` element. 此設定時顯示，但是標記為註解。This configuration is shown but commented out. 使用宣告授權管理員的原則由自訂``下的項目[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)項目。The policy used by the claims authorization manager is specified by custom `` elements under the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element. 在第一個原則中，主體必須擁有指定的宣告，以便在指定的資源上執行指定的動作的其中一個。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二個原則中，主體必須擁有這兩個宣告，若要能夠在指定的資源上執行指定的動作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在所有其他主體自動授與存取權，不論它擁有的宣告。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ```
... ... ... ... ... ...
... ... ... ... ... ... ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CheckAccess(class System.Security.Claims.AuthorizationContext context) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CheckAccess (context As AuthorizationContext) As Boolean
abstract member CheckAccess : System.Security.Claims.AuthorizationContext -> bool override this.CheckAccess : System.Security.Claims.AuthorizationContext -> bool

param.name: context
param.span: 授權內容，其中包含授權要檢查的主旨、資源及動作。

span.span: The authorization context that contains the subject, resource, and action for which authorization is to be checked.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，檢查指定之內容中主題的授權，才能對指定的資源上執行指定的動作。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, checks authorization for the subject in the specified context to perform the specified action on the specified resource.

returns.span: 如果主體獲得授權，可以對指定的資源執行指定的動作，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the subject is authorized to perform the specified action on the specified resource; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底實作一定會傳回`true`，這會授權存取。The base implementation always returns `true`, which authorizes access. 您可以覆寫這個方法來授權存取您的 RP 應用程式的需求為基礎的衍生類別中。You can override this method in a derived class to authorize access based on the requirements of your RP application. 如果此方法傳回`false`，Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 傳回呼叫端未經授權的錯誤; 否則執行會傳遞至 RP 應用程式。If this method returns `false`, Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) returns an unauthorized error to the caller; otherwise, execution is passed to the RP application. ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例取自主題`Claims Based Authorization`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 此範例提供自訂宣告授權管理員可授權主體根據組態中所指定的原則。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 自訂宣告授權管理員是由三個基本元件所組成： 類別衍生自實作管理員，`ResourceAction`類別，其中會有成對資源和動作，以及原則的讀取器讀取並編譯原則指定組態檔中。The custom claims authorization manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 此編譯原則可能則由宣告授權管理員來評估來授與對資源的存取權的主體。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 並非所有的項目會顯示為了保持簡潔。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例的 WIF 以及其下載位置，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼顯示的覆寫方法。The following code shows the override of the method. 這個方法會授與或拒絕讀取，並從組態檔所編譯的原則為依據的存取。This method grants or denies access based on a policy read and compiled from the configuration file. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#5)] 下列程式碼示範`ResourceAction`自訂宣告管理員所使用的類別。The following code shows the `ResourceAction` class used by the custom claims manager. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/resourceaction.cs#1)] 使用宣告授權管理員的原則由自訂``下的項目[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)項目。The policy used by the claims authorization manager is specified by custom `` elements under the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element. 這項原則會讀取並編譯方法。This policy is read and compiled by the method. 在第一個原則中，主體必須擁有指定的宣告，以便在指定的資源上執行指定的動作的其中一個。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二個原則中，主體必須擁有這兩個宣告，若要能夠在指定的資源上執行指定的動作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在所有其他主體自動授與存取權，不論它擁有的宣告。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ``` ... ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadCustomConfiguration(class System.Xml.XmlNodeList nodelist) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub LoadCustomConfiguration (nodelist As XmlNodeList)
abstract member LoadCustomConfiguration : System.Xml.XmlNodeList -> unit override this.LoadCustomConfiguration : System.Xml.XmlNodeList -> unit

param.name: nodelist
param.span: 清單中的每個節點的型別為 。

span.span: Each node in the list is of type .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從 XML 載入自訂組態。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads custom configuration from XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定基礎結構會呼叫方法。The method is called by the configuration infrastructure. 呼叫這個方法時，`nodelist`會包含最上層子項目的[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)從組態檔的項目。When this method is called, the `nodelist` will contain the top-level child elements of the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element from the configuration file. 每個這些項目可能會包含屬性或子項目，根據您為您的衍生類別定義組態結構描述。Each of these elements may, in turn, contain attributes or child elements depending on the configuration schema you define for your derived class. 如果任何子項目不出現在``組態檔中的項目，這個方法不會呼叫。If no child elements appear under the `` element in the configuration file, this method is not called. 預設實作會擲回。The default implementation throws a . 覆寫此方法，以啟用從組態檔宣告授權管理員的初始化衍生類別中。Override this method in your derived class to enable initialization of your claims authorization manager from a configuration file. 通常，將組態項目用來表示授權原則;不過，您可以定義項目，並根據您的應用程式的需求有意義的任何方式使用它們。Typically, the configuration elements are used to express an authorization policy; however, you can define elements and use them in any way that makes sense based on the requirements of your application. ## Examples 中所使用的程式碼範例取自主題`Claims Based Authorization`範例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Claims Based Authorization` sample. 此範例提供自訂宣告授權管理員可授權主體根據組態中所指定的原則。This sample provides a custom claims authorization manager that can authorize subjects based on a policy that is specified in configuration. 自訂宣告授權管理員是由三個基本元件所組成： 類別衍生自實作管理員，`ResourceAction`類別，其中會有成對資源和動作，以及原則的讀取器讀取並編譯原則指定組態檔中。The custom claims authorization manager consists of three basic components: a class derived from that implements the manager, the `ResourceAction` class that pairs a resource and an action, and a policy reader that reads and compiles policy that is specified in the configuration file. 此編譯原則可能則由宣告授權管理員來評估來授與對資源的存取權的主體。This compiled policy can then be used by the claims authorization manager to evaluate a principal in order to authorize access to resources. 並非所有的項目會顯示為了保持簡潔。Not all elements are shown for the sake of brevity. 如需此範例，並提供其他範例的 WIF 以及其下載位置，請參閱[WIF 程式碼範例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下列程式碼顯示的覆寫方法。The following code shows the override of the method. 這個方法會使用協助程式原則讀取器類別 （未顯示） 來讀取和編譯組態檔中指定的授權原則。This method uses a helper policy reader class (not shown) to read and compile authorization policies specified in the configuration file. 原則加入至字典中，供`ResourceAction`從資源和動作的項目，它們能為其建立的索引鍵物件。Policies are added to a dictionary and are accessed by a `ResourceAction` key object that is created from the resource and action for which they are intended. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#3)] [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/myclaimsauthorizationmanager.cs#4)] 下列程式碼示範`ResourceAction`自訂宣告管理員所使用的類別。The following code shows the `ResourceAction` class used by the custom claims manager. [!code-csharp[WifClaimsBasedAuthorization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifclaimsbasedauthorization/cs/claimsauthorizationlibrary/resourceaction.cs#1)] 使用宣告授權管理員的原則由自訂``下的項目[ <claimsAuthorizationManager> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md)項目。The policy used by the claims authorization manager is specified by custom `` elements under the [<claimsAuthorizationManager>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/claimsauthorizationmanager.md) element. 這項原則會讀取並編譯方法。This policy is read and compiled by the method. 在第一個原則中，主體必須擁有指定的宣告，以便在指定的資源上執行指定的動作的其中一個。In the first policy, the principal must possess one of the specified claims in order to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在第二個原則中，主體必須擁有這兩個宣告，若要能夠在指定的資源上執行指定的動作。In the second policy, the principal must possess both claims to be able to perform the specified action on the specified resource. 在所有其他主體自動授與存取權，不論它擁有的宣告。In all others, the principal is automatically granted access regardless of the claims it possesses. ``` ... ```
